Feature: Submit data to webdriveruniversity.com using contact us form WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='first_name']]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'Tom' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='first_name']]> WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='last_name']]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'jackson' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='last_name']]> WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='email']]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'webdriveruniversity@outlook.com' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //input[@name='email']]> WebElement is visible using locator: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //textarea[@name='message']]> Successfully Sent the following keys: 'example comment two' to element: <[[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (63040b1717c65be4027532240bda2af5)] -> xpath: //textarea[@name='message']]>
Scenario: Submit valid data via contact us form # contactus.feature:3 Given I access webdriveruniversity contact us form # ContactUsSteps.i_access_webdriveruniversity_contact_us_form() When I enter a valid firstname # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_firstname() When I enter a valid last name # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_last_name(DataTable) And i enter a valid email address # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_a_valid_email_address() And i enter comments # ContactUsSteps.i_enter_comments(DataTable) When i click on the submit button # ContactUsSteps.i_click_on_the_submit_button() java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86) at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:95) at pageObjects.ContactUs_Page.clickOnSubmiButton(ContactUs_Page.java:50) at stepDefinitions.ContactUsSteps.i_click_on_the_submit_button(ContactUsSteps.java:46) at ?.When i click on the submit button(contactus.feature:11)
Then the information should successfully be submitted via the contact us form # ContactUsSteps.the_information_should_successfully_be_submitted_via_the_contact_us_form()

Feature: Products page
